attributes.action: None EU and EU citizens Employment social housing benefits training and citizens rights in the UK and minimum wage
attributes.additional_details:
hi there im partitioning that all None British Citizens and all  European country’s to stop benefits and social housing and NHS for none British citizens this will  save millions if not billions of pounds each year so it can be pumped back into the economy for training, NHS , support services and state pension and above all Jobs. We must help our fellow citizens with social housing tax relfe and improve skills in jobless communities this will help benefit the nation and increase work and successful compertion aboard and make the unemployed employed by creating training skills like Pluming, Carpentry, bricklayers, Welders etc these are the trades that our country needs to help the unemployed get employed within a short time.
We must help those who can’t afford to train in a trade and must help those who are in need for social housing and can’t afford private accommodations
